name: the Remains chapter 1
description:
the Remains is a linear story driven horror game
set in Poland in the village of Piekielna Wioska.
You play as a nameless agent sent out to investigate
the local asylum and to retrieve a very special
individual.

Sent out by HQ with the mere location of the asylum
and codename of the individual to be retrieved,
the nameless agent goes on to investigate the
horrors of abuse in the name of science.

You play in
-First person
-A dark enviroment

Genre
horror

Gameplay
You play as an agent tasked to retrieve an target indiviual.
You only have limited resources: batteries, ammunition and health.
You'll have to fight against basic AI while searching the facility for your target.
The difficulty varies with the difficulty you select at the beginning.

Features
-Exploration (explore an old, abondoned facility of "Science" and its spawnings).
-Crafting (upgrade your weapons).
-Story (piece together the clues left behind by your target).
-Variety (multiple weapons of short and long range are available).
-Combat (sneak past enemys or confront them head on).
-Difficulty (easy, normal and hardmode are available).
-Content (1h).
